posts.post_content: Anyone have any lower grade Contentnea black and whites they are willing part with for a fair price?  I'm only interested in North Carolina teams.  ie Raleigh, Greensboro, Winston Salem, Fayetteville, Wilmington, Rocky Mount, Wilson, Charlotte, etc.  Thanks for looking and hope to hear from you.
Had some great buys already. Thanks to everyone.  Please let me know if you are looking to unload any of these beauties.  Thanks again!
